original_title: browns Hotels & Resorts shares the spirit of travel with a blend of festive cheer
original_body_lines: As the holiday season kicked into high gear, Browns Hotels & Resorts, with its exquisite properties across the country, illuminated the season’s spirit through mesmerising Christmas Tree Lighting events. A calendar brimming with joy under the theme “Sharing the Season’s Spirit,” was unveiled as Browns Hotels & Resorts invited its patrons to join and share the spirit of travel with a blend of festive cheer.

Thaala Bentota, the famous Bawa-designed coastal retreat unfurled its highly anticipated Christmas Tree Lighting ceremony with an entertaining evening featuring mulled wine, delightful canapés, carols and the festive presence of Santa, bringing gifts and surprises for the children. Channa Ekanayake, General Manager of the hotel led the proceedings, providing insight into the property’s successful holiday season. The event not only marked the beginning of the festive season but also emphasised its commitment to creating memorable experiences for guests.

Club Hotel Dolphin, one of the famous family getaway destinations under Browns Hotels & Resorts, also underwent an enchanting transformation with their Christmas Tree Lighting Event, where the 14-acre Negombo beachfront paradise was lit up, leaving guests in awe of a majestic 10 foot-tall Nutcracker.
